channel.title: Epigenomics on CityU-Bioinformatics
channel.description: Recent content in Epigenomics on CityU-Bioinformatics

item.title: DNA Modifications
item.description: Table of Contents DNA modification analysis DNA Methylation Prediction T-BioInfo MethSurv Nanopolish DNA Methylation Deconvolution FaST-LMM-EWASher ReFACTor | Reference-Free Adjustment for Cell-Type composition EDec | Epigenomic Deconvolution DNA methylation array analysis Differential Methylation Site Detection limma | Linear Models for Microarray Data FastDMA RnBeads Differential Methylation region Detection ChAMP FastDMA RnBeads Enrichment Analysis Over-representation analysis Blast2GO g:Profiler STEM | Short Time-series Expression Miner Gene set enrichment analysis GSEA | Gene Set Enrichment Analysis DESeq | Differential expression : HTS analysis edgeR | empirical analysis of DGE in R Topology enrichment analysis DAVID | Database for Annotation, Visualization and Integrated Discovery HOMER | Hypergeometric Optimization of Motif EnRichment GeneCodis | Topology enrichment analysis Bisulfite Sequencing Data Analysis (BS-seq analysis) Differential Methylation region Detection methylKit | Methylation annotation : BS-seq analysis SMART | Specific Methylation Analysis and Report Tool DSS-single | Differentially methylated region detection : BS-seq analysis Methylation Annotation GBSA | Genome Bisulfite Sequencing Analyser methylKit | Methylation annotation : BS-seq analysis EWAS ReFACTor | Reference-Free Adjustment for Cell-Type composition FaST-LMM-EWASher Find more tools: OMICTOOLS DNA modification analysis Whole genome DNA methylation detection is one of the most important part of epigenetics research.

item.title: Nucleosome Positioning
item.description: Table of Contents Nucleosome Positioning NuCMap | Nucleosome positioning : Epigenomics nuMap | Nucleosome positioning : Epigenomics ICM | Interactive Chromatin Modeling MNase-seq analysis PING nucleR NOrMAL ATAC-seq analysis NucleoATAC | Nucleosome positionning analysis : ATAC-seq analysis Find more tools: OMIVTOOLS Nucleosome Positioning NuCMap | Nucleosome positioning : Epigenomics Maps directly nucleosome centers. NuCMap is based on chemical modification of engineered histones.
